title: Top U.S. states by number of hogs and pigs 2019
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing State, and Number in thousands in each State on the y axis.
The Number in thousands is appeared to be the highest at State Iowa and lowest at State Kansas.
The highest State Iowa has 21460.0 more Number in thousands than the lowest State Kansas.
